summary: I am an awarded 'WebGeek' with Hands-on experience of CSS Framework W3.CSS, and Bootstrap3, Google's MV(Whatever) Front End Framework AngularJS. I also have good knowledge of HTML5, Object Oriented Javascript., PHP, SDLC, Git and Github.
I am a tech savvy who likes to play with Front End Development.
services: Translating those wireframes/mockups/prototypes into fully functional UI.
Responsive web app or Hybrid mobile app development using W3.css/Bootstrap 3/Ionic, AngularJS.
Source code management, version/revision control using git and github or bitbucket.
Images editing and simple animations using Adobe Photoshop CS6
Object oriented modeling using smart draw.
